overview: Silent film set to the music and poetry of Queer artist, MaDame Düx.  The MC is re-writing the journey of four Queer characters on a vintage Underwood typewriter. Each Character, seems destined to a miserable life in black & white until the MC intervenes. The MC reroutes their destiny’s, releasing them from their pain, shame and unhappiness.
title: The 490th Incarnation of MaDame Düx
